Desc.entry: A registered charity which is a branch of a global non-profit organisation. Runs an exchange programme placing students in a variety of international internships as a means of combating a variety of issues. Works to bring qualified and motivated international students to the UK and place them in a business in the South Yorkshire region. Is a member of the Junior Chamber of Commerce and has close links with several other networking organisations. Develops its members to be the socially responsible leaders of tomorrow. Self or any referral.

Address.entry: The University of Sheffield Union of Students
